p: Thirdly, supervising of the implementation of the COVID-19 health care services for pregnant women in primary care institutes had been carried out. As of 23 January 2020, experts in Obstetrics, Pediatrics and Hospital Infection Management are organized in groups to cover all districts and counties of the city. Experts and public officials mainly visited maternal and child health care institutions and private medical institutions to supervise the implementation of pre-examination, fever clinic, isolation waiting point and isolation ward. At the same time, experts also gave guidance regarding the management of postpartum women and newborns during the isolation period.
